extendedInfo.description: Chat with other Snap Chat users using our CupidsChat - chat rooms. Find new SnapChat users that share your similar interest. You can even and add them to your friends list, so you can chat with them later.  Use the chat rooms to exchange Snap Chat usernames. Best of all, chatting is free and live. So what are you waiting for ? Time to find new friends today. Benefits:â¢	Real SnapChat Usersâ¢	Snap Chat users from worldwide, not just the  USâ¢	Live instant chat, no delay ( Fast US Servers)â¢	Multiple chat rooms for different interests, not only for finding SnapChat Usersâ¢	Create your own profile, and view othersâ¢	Safe - ability to report users & active moderationâ¢	spamming & bad word filters enabledâ¢	Colorful emoticonsReviews:"Lots of people to talk to. It's really cool.  I made friends and found many SnapChat users!" - Lilian" Cool App. Fun and easy to meet people." - Hailey "I wish I found this app sooner. Now I have a lot more fun when I'm bored, and I found a ton of new Snap Chat friends!" - LucyFor best performance please connect to WI-Fi. Chatrooms for SnapChat  are for users 18 years and older only. Even though this is a mature chat, do not upload adult or offensive content. If caught violating our terms, your account will be blocked permanently.Disclaimer: These chat rooms are maintained by CupidsChat.com, and are in no way affiliated with SnapChat.
